sn35.54:1.1: “Kathaṃ nu kho, bhante, jānato, kathaṃ passato, saṃyojanā pahīyantī”ti?
sn35.54:1.2: “Cakkhuṃ kho, bhikkhu, aniccato jānato passato saṃyojanā pahīyanti.
sn35.54:1.6: yampidaṃ cakkhusamphassapaccayā uppajjati vedayitaṃ sukhaṃ vā dukkhaṃ vā adukkhamasukhaṃ vā tampi aniccato jānato passato saṃyojanā pahīyanti.
sn35.54:1.15: yampidaṃ manosamphassapaccayā uppajjati vedayitaṃ sukhaṃ vā dukkhaṃ vā adukkhamasukhaṃ vā tampi aniccato jānato passato saṃyojanā pahīyanti.
sn35.54:1.16: Evaṃ kho, bhikkhu, jānato evaṃ passato saṃyojanā pahīyantī”ti.
